article_title: Deloitte State Contracts Repeatedly Over Time, Budget: Report - Page: 1

og.description: Deloitte Consulting has been fired by the Massachusetts government for falling short of contract goals, with more than 1,000 defects in its latest system.
og.title: Deloitte State Contracts Repeatedly Over Time, Budget: Report

article_metadata.description: Deloitte Consulting has been fired by Massachusetts Department of Revenue for falling short of goals, a move that seems to be a repeat offense in the company's state government technology contracts. Page: 1
